com.github.maxstupo.jannoargs

Class JAnnoArgs

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.maxstupo.jannoargs.JAnnoArgs

  • public class JAnnoArgs
extends java.lang.Object
    JAnnoArgs class handles the reading of program arguments and sets fields with the annotation CmdArgument.
    Author:
    Maxstupo

    • Method Detail

      • parseArguments

        public void parseArguments(java.lang.Object obj,
                  java.lang.String... args)
        Parse given string array, and set the fields that are annotated with a CmdArgument annotation from the given object. Supported data types are Boolean, String, Integer, Float, Double, Long and the listed primitive counterparts.

        Syntax:
        - Boolean fields prefix the key with plus(+) for true, or prefix a hyphen(-) for false.
        - Value fields prefix the key with double hyphens (--) followed by a space and the value.

        Parameters:
        obj - The object to look for fields and apply values to fields.
        args -

      • createKeyToFieldsMap

        public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.reflect.Field> createKeyToFieldsMap(java.lang.Object obj)
        Gets all fields annotated with CmdArgument from the given object and maps them to the given key from the annotation.
        Parameters:
        obj - The object to search for fields.
        Returns:
        A map containing fields referenced by keys.

      • printCmdArgumentFields

        public static void printCmdArgumentFields(java.lang.Object obj)
        Prints all fields in the given object annotated with a CmdArgument annotation with format of [key: (fieldName = fieldValue)]
        Parameters:
        obj - The object to look for fields.

        public static final JAnnoArgs get()
